title: The Train Ride Book

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• The switch user can join in when reading the book by using their switches to say the repeated line in the story!
• Record "what" on one switch and "see" on the other
• Read the story to the switch user and on the first repeated line, press their switches to show them what they need to do e.g "We're off on a journey out of the town" what "shall I" see what "shall I" see
• Continue the story and pause on the repeated lines for the switch user to fill in the gap

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to say the repeated line in the book
